title: Reports Generation and Download UI
description:
Comprehensive Reports Interface with Multi-Format Export

Build a full-featured reports module that enables users to select report types, apply filters, preview results, and download reports in multiple formats (PDF, Excel/CSV, JSON).

Core Features:
- Report type selector displaying all available report categories with descriptions
- Dynamic filter panel that adapts based on selected report type
  - Date range picker (single date, range, or predefined periods)
  - Multi-select dropdowns for categories and status
  - Text search for specific records
  - Clear all filters button
- Format selection with visual icons (PDF, Excel, CSV, JSON)
- Report preview table showing sample data before download
- Download button with progress indicator during generation
- Filter persistence: save and restore user's last-used filters per report type

User Experience:
- Show loading spinner with progress percentage during generation
- Display estimated time for large reports
- Provide clear error messages for validation failures, timeouts, or generation errors
- Disable incompatible filters when certain report types are selected
- Confirm before generating reports that may take significant time
- Allow cancellation of in-progress report generation

Generated Report Requirements:
- Include metadata header: generation timestamp, applied filters, generated by user, report type
- Add page numbers and total page count (for PDF)
- Include column headers and proper formatting in all formats
- Embed company branding/logo where applicable

Technical Considerations:
- Implement client-side filter validation before submission
- Handle large datasets via streaming downloads or chunked generation
- Set timeout limits (e.g., 5 minutes max) with clear user communication
- Implement rate limiting to prevent concurrent report spam
- Cache report generation results temporarily for re-download
- Track file size limits: warn users before generating oversized reports

Edge Cases:
- No results matching filter criteria: show empty state with suggestions
- Partial data availability: indicate incomplete datasets in report
- Stale cached data: show cache timestamp and refresh option
- Browser compatibility for file downloads (support major browsers)
- Network interruption during download: enable resume or regeneration
- Maximum concurrent reports per user: queue or block with informative message

Error Handling:
- Invalid date ranges: prevent selection and show validation message
- Backend timeout: notify user and offer to email report when ready
- Insufficient permissions: display access denied with explanation
- Format generation failure: fallback to alternative format or raw data
- File size exceeds limit: prompt user to narrow filters

Dependencies Required:
- Backend REST API endpoints: GET /reports/types, POST /reports/generate, GET /reports/download/:id
- Report generation service supporting PDF, Excel, CSV, JSON formats
- File storage system for temporary report caching
- Authentication/authorization system for access control
- Frontend date picker, multi-select, and table components

Success Criteria:
- Users can generate any report type with appropriate filters within 30 seconds for typical datasets
- All formats download correctly across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
- Filter preferences persist across sessions
- Error states provide actionable guidance
- Large reports (>10K rows) complete or provide alternative delivery method
